titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-217, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 82.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 426.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 193 (Roll no. 458).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 179 (Roll no. 459).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/8/2005--Passed House without amendment. Makes it in order at any time on September 8, 2005, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions to suspend the rules.
